metadata.name: ULTIMATE TOTTIE #1
metadata.description:
Ultimate Totties are the rarest TOTTIE tokens in the Hot Potato collection. You can get one through winning an auction or purchasing on secondary.

Once you have an Ultimate Tottie, you'll have the chance to collect some of Hot Potato's most coveted collectibles.

When the Ordinals infrastructure becomes more accessible, burn your Ultimate Tottie to receive an exclusive Bitcoin Ordinal Potato PFP and a Trading Card from the first pack on ETH!

The Ultimate Burn is only for the most dedicated and determined collectors. Unlock the power of the Ultimate Tottie and become a part of the hottest Web3 community.
